comments:
Repro:

1. Preferences -> Server -> Installed Runtimes -> Add...
2. Select any tomcat version. Go to the next page.
3. Press the "Installed JREs..." button.

A dialog with message "An error has occurred. See error log for more details." pops up. Once you dismiss the dialog, the correct preferences page does come up. The following stack is in the log:

I also see the same behavior on the generic servers.

Platform bug, nothing to do with WTP.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 152962 ***
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
